summary: An Ordinance transferring funds from the General Fund to Local Improvement Funds for the improvement of the following District in the following amounts: Eighteenth Avenue Fund District No. 277, Ordinance No. 6019 $94.17 E. Madison Street Fund District No. 256, Ordinance No. 5869 $145.32 for the purpose of retiring the unpaid balances of Bonds issued for the improvement of the above districts.
